product.description: Linkrunner is an AI-driven Mobile Measurement Partner (MMP) designed to track and analyze top-performing distribution channels, providing insights down to the click, download, and onboarding stages.

features.name: Channel Performance Tracking
features.description: Tracks the performance of distribution channels down to granular levels like clicks, downloads, and onboarding.

features.name: AI-Driven Analytics
features.description: Utilizes artificial intelligence to provide insights and analytics for mobile marketing.

product.targeted_market: Mobile app developers, marketers, and businesses looking to optimize their user acquisition strategies and understand the ROI of their marketing channels. Given the search query context, this product is aimed at companies seeking effective mobile attribution solutions.
product.problem_product_is_solving: The product addresses the challenge of understanding which marketing channels are most effective for acquiring and retaining mobile users. It solves the problem of opaque attribution by providing granular tracking and AI-driven insights, enabling businesses to make data-backed decisions for their user acquisition efforts and avoid wasting marketing spend on underperforming channels.
